page.title: 13A Day in Anstruther
page.content: "Yawn!" When my digital alarm goes at 07:45 I get out of bed, shower and dress in my polyester skirt and woolly jumper. I go downstairs, eat my Shreddies, blow-dry my hair and wait for my friend Vivien. We get to school as the bell rings. I wait with the other Prefects until all the lines are in. In class we have RE, spelling and this term's project "Underground". At break we play "Tig". We complete the project assignment before going to the hall for drama with our visiting teacher. At 12:30 I go home to lunch on ham rolls and a cake. At 13:30 we restart school. We do maths and art. 15:15 and school's out. I go for my piano lesson. At home I change into my demin jeans, get my tea and go to the disco. When I get home I watch TV,play a computer game and go to bed. "Yawn!"
